title: Duskblade doesn't proc off shaco's q
body: Unless ive read it wrong, my understanding is that if you're unseen for 1 second, you should proc duskblade? I've noticed that shaco's q never procs duskblade.

replies.body: Im almost certain that ive actually tested the full q lenght at some point, but i will have a suss. It is quite possible that i did stuff something up somewhere without the full second. I'll test it out in the next game i play.
The passive should proc on enhanced Basic Attacks, and Shaco's Q falls into that slot. So I really don't know what that is happening there.
maybe he wasn't invisible for the full 1s to get the duskblade proc I guess. It's not that hard of a mistake to make if you aren't used to duskblade.

maybe you experienced a match specific bug? I've had great success using duskblade procs to setup kills using shaco, the damage is crazy, and lategame with enough cdr and using bushes you can proc is multiple times.
